nodes.text: The Mandalorian: The Mandalorian's Quest is a forthcoming storybook for young readers by Brooke Vitale that adapts events of the second season of the The Mandalorian television series. It is scheduled to be published on January 11, 2022 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
Relive your favorite moments from season two of Star Wars: The Mandalorian!
This colorful, dynamic, action-packed storybook lets young readers relive the highlights of the second season of the smash-hit Disney+ live action television series, Star Wars: The Mandalorian.

From the Mandalorian himself, to the adorable Grogu, and other characters like Greef Karga, and Moff Gideon, some of the most exciting moments from season two are here to enjoy along with full-color stickers!
